heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of late-day rain showers in areas south and west of Interstate 89. Highs in the mid to upper 40s, some lower 40s northeast. South winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy. Rain likely, with some isolated and brief wintry mix possible northeast. Lows from the mid 30s to lower 40s, some lower 30s northeast. Light winds, variable to south, except south around 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered rain showers. Highs in the mid to upper 50s in the south, and upper 40s to mid 50s north. Winds light from the south, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.
